about_the_game:
Play As Pixelmons!


Pixelmon Arena is a roguelike action-adventure where you play as Pixelmons! Explore and battle your way through the different biomes and discover exciting encounters. Collect shardstones from your expeditions out into the wild and use them back in the game hub to unlock upgrades and become stronger.

EXPLORE THE WILDERNESS

The wilderness is populated with wild and aggressive Pixelmon! Face off against a variety of enemies and bosses that will test your strategic thinking and reflexes as you progress deeper into the unknown.

INFINITE REPLAYABILITY

Each playthrough offers a unique experience with varying upgrades found through each run, ensuring no two adventures are the same.

SKILL TREE PROGRESSION

Each Pixelmon has their own unique playstyle with different abilities and skill trees. Spend shardstones from your runs to upgrade your Pixelmon and unlock stronger versions of your abilities.

RUNE SYSTEM

Improve your Pixelmons by equipping Runes obtained from your runs which provide powerful stat upgrades!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750-Ti / AMD RX 550, 2GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7500K / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580, 4GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
